AmbientLightSensor.summary: NOTE Experimental The AmbientLightSensor interface of the Sensor APIs returns the current light level or illuminance of the ambient light around the hosting device.

remarks.para: To use this sensor, the user must grant permission to the 'ambient-light-sensor' device sensor through the Permissions API.
This feature may be blocked by a Permissions Policy set on your server.

AmbientLightSensorIlluminance.summary: NOTE Experimental The illuminance read-only property of the interface returns the current light level in lux of the ambient light level around the hosting device.
AmbientLightSensorIlluminance.value: A indicating the current light level in lux.

AmbientLightSensorAmbientLightSensor.summary: NOTE Experimental The AmbientLightSensor() constructor creates a new object, which returns the current light level or illuminance of the ambient light around the hosting device.
